name: The Map
mission: Extract hawkish/dovish tone, forward pressure, rate path, and macro wind direction.
ai_analysis: The macroeconomic landscape is characterized by a DXY at 98.99, indicating a strong US dollar, and an Oil price at $60.08, which is relatively low. The Gold price at $4227.70 is near historical highs, suggesting some safe-haven demand. The SP500 at 6870.40 is near all-time highs, indicating a positive equity market environment.
